com.facebook.buck.support.cli.args

Class GlobalCliOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.support.cli.args.GlobalCliOptions

  • public class GlobalCliOptions
extends Object
    Contains CLI options that are common to all of the commands.
